about_the_game:
On Halloween night, the pumpkins left in the backyards of a quiet suburb suddenly turned into creepy monsters.

Now, in addition to having to hide from their pursuers while trying not to kill any of them, in the "Dark Side of the Sun" chapter Kanta will also have to fight these monsters.

Usage

Update the main program to version at least 1.2.3, connect additional content LEMURIA - Halloween, and reach the game chapter "Dark Side of the Sun" or download its saving.

Notes

.The above monsters are not impassable bosses, they are not meant to be. They are fairly easy to destroy with pistol shots. However, those who wish can try to use a knife, and that will not be easy...

Congratulations to all on Halloween and wish you all a happy holiday!
